nodes.text: The Unitive was a Consular-class cruiser of the Galactic Republic that was captained by Pietrangelo during the time of the Clone Wars.

In 23 BBY, at a deep-space rendezvous point within the Tapani sector, Jedi Knights Bultar Swan and Obi-Wan Kenobi oversaw, within the Unitive's salon pod, salvage rights negotiations for the alleged ancient Sun Runner transport. The opposing parties involved in the dispute for acquisition of the transport were Senator Rodd of Fondor, who arrived in his salvage hauler, and the Margravine Quenelle of Nallastia, known also to the jungle-moon clans as the Skull Queen, who arrived in her rescue runner.
